.. _`bedGraphToBigWig`:

BEDGRAPHTOBIGWIG
================

Convert *.bedGraph file to *.bw file (see http://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/admin/exe/linux.x86_64/FOOTER.txt)






Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule bedGraphToBigWig:
        input:
            bedGraph="{sample}.bedGraph",
            chromsizes="genome.chrom.sizes"
        output:
            "{sample}.bw"
        log:
            "logs/{sample}.bed-graph_to_big-wig.log"
        params:
            "" # optional params string
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/ucsc/bedGraphToBigWig"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
